title: NIT Rourkela Recruitment 2026 - Apply Offline for Junior Research Fellow Posts
description: National Institute of Technology Rourkela (NIT Rourkela)  has released an official notification for the recruitment of 01 Junior Research Fellow Posts. Those candidates who have qualified in the M.E/ M.Tech, M.Sc can grab this chance and apply for the NIT Rourkela Recruitment 2026 . Here, we included the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. If you are looking for more, here is a list of Government Jobs in 2026 th...
